content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: --STDTC
      operator: exists
Core:
  Id: CORE-000207
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Trigger error when --STDTC is present in a Findings general observation
  class
Outcome:
  Message: --STDTC is present in a Findings general observation class
  Output Variables:
    - --STDTC
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Dataset
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0467
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Note that --STDTC should not be used in the Findings
                  general observation class and is therefore blank in the following
                  table.
                Document: IG v3.4
                Section: 4.4.8
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - FINDINGS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

json.Description: Trigger error when --STDTC is present in a Findings general observation class

Outcome.Message: --STDTC is present in a Findings general observation class

Citations.Cited_Guidance: Note that --STDTC should not be used in the Findings general observation class and is therefore blank in the following table.
